root.name: Combat Mission: Shock Force - NATO
root.description: OverviewNew Forces introduced in the module:GermanCanadianDutchNew Vehicles and Equipment introduced:NATO:Leopard Main Battle Tank (multiple variants)Marder Infantry Fighting Vehicle (2 variants)Fennek Armored Personnel Carrier (2 variants)Wiesel Light Tank (3 variants)LAV I Infantry Fighting VehicleLAV III Infantry Fighting Vehicle (4 variants)Nyala Armored Personnel Carrier (2 variants)CV9035 Infantry Fighting VehicleYPR 765 Armored Personnel Carrier (4 variants)G-Wagon Light Wheeled Utility Vehicle (2 variants)Wolf Light Wheeled Utility Vehicle (2 variants)Syrian:ZSU-23-4 Shilka Self-propelled Anti-Air ArtilleryZil-131 - Heavy Transport TruckHeavy Technical /w ZU-23-2 Anti-Air AutocannonOff-map Air and Artillery Support introduced:NATO:PzH 2000 155mm Self-propelled Howitzer120mm MortarC3 81mm MortarLG Mark 2 105mm HowitzerM777 155mm HowitzerMMB Bo-105 HelicopterCF-18 Multirole FighterCH 146 Griffon HelicopterApache HelicopterF-16 Multirole FighterSyrian:MiG-23 FighterMiG-21bis FighterSu-25 Close Air SupportSu-22M Fighter-BomberSu-17M Fighter-BomberMi-24P Attack HelicopterMi-24D Attack Helicopter System RequirementsPentium 4 2 GHz, 512 MB RAM, graphic card 128 MB (GeForce 4 Ti4200 or better), 1 GB HDD, Windows XP/Vista/7.
